title: Understanding Physician-Assisted Dying
text: Physician-assisted dying is a legal option in certain states within the United States. It allows terminally ill patients to request and receive a prescription for medication to end their life in a peaceful manner.

title: States with Legal Physician-Assisted Dying
text: Consider the states that have passed laws allowing physician-assisted dying. These states have specific regulations and requirements for patients and healthcare providers.

title: Identifying the States
text: List the states where physician-assisted dying is legal.
